name: Domaindriven.be
tagline: Website for the Belgian DDD group
body:
# Belgian DDD Community

* Keep in touch via Twitter: [@DDDBE](http://twitter.com/dddbe)
* Join the discussion on [Google Groups](https://groups.google.com/forum/#!forum/be-ddd)
* Come to our [meetups and events](http://dddbe.eventbrite.com/)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
